snippet: Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw threw eight innings of two-hit ball, retiring his final 15 batters, as the Dodgers knocked off the Angels, 3-1.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers defeat Los Angeles Angels, 3-1; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw threw eight innings of two-hit ball, retiring his final 15 batters, as the Dodgers knocked off the Angels, 3-1.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers Win as Kershaw Continues Scoreless Run
headline.main: Kershaw’s Scoreless Streak Hits 37 in Dodgers’ Win
